701449f-a.title: Bronx: Meagher Avenue - Schurz Avenue
701449f-a.text:
Meagher Ave., west side, between Schurz and Chaffee Aves., showing
an old stone house and the rear of a large barn, the front of which
faces on the west side of the avenue. These were formerly part of the
Thomas J. Havemeyer estate. The view is southward.
July 25, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
